org.sakaiproject.entitybroker.impl

Class EntityTaggingService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.entitybroker.impl.EntityTaggingService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TagProvider, TagSearchService

    public class EntityTaggingService
extends Object
implements TagSearchService
    Handles calls through the system related to tagging, can delegate to a central tagging service
    Author:
    Aaron Zeckoski (azeckoski @ gmail.com)

      • findEntitesByTags

        public List<EntityData> findEntitesByTags(String[] tags,
                                 String[] prefixes,
                                 boolean matchAll,
                                 Search search)
        Description copied from interface: TagSearchService
        Search for all entities with a set of tags, prefixes, and a search
        Specified by:
        findEntitesByTags in interface TagSearchService
        Parameters:
        tags - a set of tags defined on these entities which should match
        prefixes - (optional) limit the search to a given set of prefixes
        matchAll - if true then all tags must be matched, else find entities with any tags in the set given
        search - (optional) search params which are used to limit the return (paging and max/limit)
        Returns:
        a list of entity data objects representing all found entities

      • getTagsForEntity

        public List<String> getTagsForEntity(String reference)
        Description copied from interface: TagProvider
        Get the set of tags which are associated with this entity
        Specified by:
        getTagsForEntity in interface TagProvider
        Parameters:
        reference - a globally unique reference to an entity (e.g. /myprefix/myid), consists of the entity prefix and optional segments (normally the id at least)
        Returns:
        a set of the tags which are associated with this entity

      • addTagsToEntity

        public void addTagsToEntity(String reference,
                   String[] tags)
        Description copied from interface: TagProvider
        Add these tags to the an entity, will have no effect if the entity already has these tags
        Specified by:
        addTagsToEntity in interface TagProvider
        Parameters:
        reference - a globally unique reference to an entity (e.g. /myprefix/myid), consists of the entity prefix and optional segments (normally the id at least)
        tags - a set of the tags to associate with this entity

      • removeTagsFromEntity

        public void removeTagsFromEntity(String reference,
                        String[] tags)
        Description copied from interface: TagProvider
        Removes these tags from this entity, will have no effect if the tags do not exist on this entity
        Specified by:
        removeTagsFromEntity in interface TagProvider
        Parameters:
        reference - a globally unique reference to an entity (e.g. /myprefix/myid), consists of the entity prefix and optional segments (normally the id at least)
        tags - a set of the tags to remove from this entity, if this is empty then nothing happens, if this includes tags that do not exist on this entity then they are ignored

      • setTagsForEntity

        public void setTagsForEntity(String reference,
                    String[] tags)
        Description copied from interface: TagProvider
        Sets the tags which are associated with this entity, this overwrites any current tags and makes the input tags the only current tags for this entity
        Specified by:
        setTagsForEntity in interface TagProvider
        Parameters:
        reference - a globally unique reference to an entity (e.g. /myprefix/myid), consists of the entity prefix and optional segments (normally the id at least)
        tags - a set of the tags to associate with this entity, setting this to an empty set will remove all tags from this entity

      • diffEntityTags

        protected void diffEntityTags(String reference,
                  String[] tags,
                  Set<String> addTags,
                  Set<String> removeTags)
        Finds the current tags and then diffs them to get the tags which need to be added and the tags which need to be deleted
        Parameters:
        reference - entity ref
        tags - desired set of tags
        addTags - tags which need to be added
        removeTags - tags which need to be removed

        protected void validateTags(String[] tags)
        Validate a set of tags
        Parameters:
        tags -
